name: encodeForXML
description: Encodes a string for safe use within an XML tag body. Use `encodeForXMLAttribute` for variables output inside an XML attribute value.

params.name: canonicalize
params.description: When `true` the canonicalize function is called before encoding the input. If set to false, the given input string will just be encoded, both mixed and multiple encodings will be allowed.

lucee.notes: Lucee does not support the canonicalize argument.

examples.title: Simple encodeForXML Example
examples.description: Encodes the ampersand into an XML entity.
